amendment.description: To exclude AbilityOne goods from the authority to acquire goods and services manufactured in Afghanistan, central Asian states, and Djibouti.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1472 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1472 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270) To exclude AbilityOne goods from the authority to acquire goods and services manufactured in Afghanistan, central Asian states, and Djibouti.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1472 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1472 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
